name: Choppy Chefs
description:
Enter the ultimate battle between two top chefs!

Challenge a friend (or enemy) for who can make a pasta Bolognese the quickest in this local multiplayer.

Both players share the same keyboard. Match the correct action by pressing A S D (for player 1) and J K L (for player 2).

If you reach a streak of 5 you can press W (for player 1) or I (for player 2) to throw food at your opponent to make them lose progress.

All assets are made in Houdini <3

Have fun!
